info.description: Allows the creation, updation and closure of the portfolio, delinking an account from the portfolio and retrieves the account balance, valuation and other information
info.title: Portfolio Management

parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

accountIds.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

account.description: Identifies the unique account Id of the payment entered.

jointHolderId.description: The identifier of the joint holder

jointRelationCode.description: The identifier of the relationship between joint holder and owner

additionalDetail.description: Additional details provided to add context. Closure notes for closed accounts, positing restriction details for restricted accounts & joint holder notes or account title for active accounts

valuationCurrency.description: The currency in which the account or portfolio is valued

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

investmentProgram.description: The identifier of the investment strategy followed by the Portfolio

managedAccount.description: The type of managed account- Discretionary or otherwise

safekeepChargeAccount.description: The cash account to which safe custody charges need to be posted

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

totalLiability.description: The total liability of the portfolio

netLombardValue.description: The net Lombard value of the portfolio

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

realisationPercentage.description: Percentage of realisation of the Lombard value of the portfolio

pledgeBalance.description: The balance of the pledged securities

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

transactionReference.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

orderType.description: Identifies the type of the order. Possible values are Single, Ifdone, Revol, oco. Single order - only one order item may be input. If done order -  If one order gets executed, the other order is also executed immediately. Revolving order -  based on the condition specified, it will wait for both the deals to be executed simultaneously. OCO -If one order gets executed, then the other order gets cancelled.

limitPrice.description: The Price at which the shares are to be bought or sold

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

orderedAt.description: The time at which the order has been transacted

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

valueInReferenceCurrency.description: The amount converted to the required reference currency

amountInReferenceCurrency.description: Contains description of the Asset Type

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

feesAndTaxesInSecurityCurrency.description: Indicates the fees and taxes calculated in Instrument Currency

feesAndTaxesInReferenceCurrency.description: Indicates the fees and taxes derived in portfolio Reference Currency

inputterId.description: Captures the Id of the user who performed the activity on the arrangement

application.description: Name of the application or virtual table

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

valuationAmt.description: This is the valuation amount of the portfolio in reference currency

valuationCurrency.description: The currency in which the account or portfolio is valued

unrealProfitLoss.description: The unrealised profit or loss i.e. Profit or loss arising out of revaluation of open positions.

unrealisedProfitLossPercentage.description: Contains the unrealised Profit Loss Percentage

assetType.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

assetTypeDescription.description: Contains description of the Asset Type

subAssetTypeId.description: Identifies the group of like Securities, which are reported together

subAssetType.description: The name of the Sub Asset Type

valueInReferenceCurrency.description: The amount converted to the required reference currency

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

amountInAccountCurrency.description: Amount in the currency of the account

amountInReferenceCurrency.description: Contains description of the Asset Type

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

industryName.description: Identifies the name of the industry in which the security belongs to.

costPriceInReferenceCurrency.description: Contains the cost price in portfolio reference currency

costValue.description: Contains the total cost value of the asset

costValueInReferenceCurrency.description: Contains the derived total cost value of the asset in portfolio reference currency

marketPrice.description: Current Market Price of the Security

estimation.description: The value of the Portfolio at current market price

assetEstimation.description: Total estimation positions of the portfolio

unrealizedPLInReferenceCurrency.description: Contains the unrealised profit and loss amount in portfolio reference currency

unrealisedProfitLossPercentage.description: Contains the unrealised Profit Loss Percentage

unrealizedPLPercentageReferenceCurrency.description: Contains the unrealized profit and loss percentage in portfolio reference currency

weight.description: Indicates the weightage of the security holdings against the total estimation of a portfolio in reference currency.

application.description: Name of the application or virtual table

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

subAssetTypeId.description: Identifies the group of like Securities, which are reported together

subAssetType.description: The name of the Sub Asset Type

assetType.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

instrumentDomicile.description: Specifies the country domicile of the Security being issued
